title: SAMSUNG GALAXY S24+ 5G, 6.7", 50+10+12/12MP, 12/512GB, 4900MAH, GRAY
description:
Мобилен телефон
Android 14, One UI 6.1
IP68 водоотпорна (1.5m за 30 мин)
Glass front (Gorilla Glass Victus 3), glass back (Gorilla Glass Victus 3), aluminum frame
Екран 6.7" (1440x3088) Dynamic LTPO AMOLED 2X, 120Hz, HDR10+, 2600 nits (peak)
Chipset:Exynos 2400, 10-core, 4nm
GPU:Samsung Xclipse 940
Интерна меморија:512GB,RAM 12GB
Примарна камера:
50 MP, f/1.8, 24mm (wide), 1/1.56", 1.0µm, Dual Pixel PDAF, OIS
10 MP, f/2.4, 70mm (telephoto), 1/3.94", 1.0µm, PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
12 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 120? (ultrawide), 1/2.55" 1.4µm, Super Steady video
Секундарна камера:
12 MP, f/2.2, 26mm (wide), Dual Pixel PDAF
Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6e/7, tri-band, Wi-Fi Direct
Bluetooth: 5.3, A2DP, LE
GPS, GLONASS, BDS, GALILEO
NFC
USB Type-C 3.2, OTG
Fast charging:
45W wired, PD3.0, 65% in 30 min (advertised)
15W wireless (Qi/PMA)
4.5W reverse wireless
Батерија:Li-Ion 4900mAh
